title: Application crash after rotating screen
body:
Steps to reproduce:
* Auto-rotate feature is enabled in system
* Start learning process in AnyMemo
* When question is visible, rotate screen
* Error message: "Unfortunately, AnyMemo has stopped."

Versions:
* AnyMemo 10.9.922 (F-Droid build)
* CyanogenMod 13.0-20161219-NIGHTLY-m7
comments: Thank you for reporting. I can repo the issue. I will look into it soon.

The issue is fixed in commit 3eb738ac52144fe7b50e16d24a6bed60aaeda51c.
Closing this issue. Please let me know if it still happens and reopen the issue. Thanks!
